participant_1.background: hey there i'm 23 and i love food. i also like to cook but i'm not very good at it. i have been trying all types of food everywhere i go. i have been traveling the world for a years.

participant_2.name: George
participant_2.personality: Wise and nurturing, with a passion for family and crafting.
participant_2.background: i have amazing children and grandchildren. i had cancer but its gone now. i can sew my own clothes. i am retired and living the great life.
